channel.title: Eldrazi/Paradox 728 ECO & PK releases
channel.description:
Okay, well i know a lot of you won't know about this project because when i started it Matrix sources weren't aloud of r-s.
the story: I started a 604 a couple years ago called Eldrazi, i worked on it for about 3 weeks straight with 4 other people. Turned out there where way to many bugs to be fixed by myself alone. So i released it on Mopar, about 3 months ago i started Eldrazi 718, i updated the cache to work w/out op codes to 728. i worked on the project on my own time for about a month than i got an offer from tyluur's old head admin 'tillian' or 'ryan' and he had a VB forum and a 317 called lethium 'yeah i know its the same as tyluurs old server' but anyways he wanted a 718+ so we changed the project name to Paradox 728, i than updated to 736 cache and put it back down to 728 because we needed to release it in a week or two after i updated and i didn't have the time to fix all of the object/npc path walking bugs. ANyways so i worked my ass off on the ECO server was almost ready for release but there where still a shit tone of bugs to fix so me and ryan came up with a new project [paradoxPK] now the concept of this was to have a pk server but not like all of the other pk servers out there. It was going to be based on PKing alone with rewards such as money & PK points based on if you where in multi or single and how much you where risking when u killed a player also with killstreak support. Now i almost finished it i just had to finish the shop system to work with PKP 'pk points' which i never finished because i resigned from the project because i need to move on with my life. So i gave ryan the sources + client, but i will not let my work go down that easy. I am releasing it to the public on both r-s and mopar if you would like to know more look below.
Features:
[ul][*]All matrix features* [*]fixed shop system [*]NPCdrop packing [*]drop editor fixed for 718+ [*]custom home tele [*]new tutorial custom made for ease [*]worldmessage send after getting a rare drop [*]worldmessage sent after a 99 or 120 is achieved [*]ring o' wealth [*]started slayer base [*]started shop editor [*]bones on altar [*]money pouch [*]max cash fixes for money pouch [*]and more i can't remember[/ul]
what needs fixing:
[ul][*]tutorial seems to not save at the end [*]portal teleing fixed 'cbf to finish a simple dialogue' [*]finish the halloween event [*]items from other players not showing in general store [*]all 13 trillion NPC spawns deleted 'you have to add the ones that matter back'[/ul]
features and required fixes for PK SOURCE:
[ul][*]killstreak w/highest killstreak support [*]custom quest interface for info tab [*]Pk point support [*]you need to finish my shop system for the pkp's [*]tweak with the method for PKP rewarding [*]add money to the kills [*]deleted everything in the PK source that is unneeded reducing lag by 40-50%[/ul]
Media: [NOTE- this is just media from eldrazi everything else was deleted on our website since i resigned 'sorry']
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEZtH6R5U9E"]YOUTUBE -> tele system[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-DnFZagdpy0"]YOUTUBE -> start tutorial[/URL]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1alN3[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1alMG[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1alM7[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/19HXY[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/19I2T[/img]
Sorry for no other media they where all deleted.
Credits Matrix team -> 60% me -> 35% jagex -> 5% for cache
Sorry to everyone who hates me im done with RSPS peace guys
LINKS -
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95538742/p_728_c_client.rar"]728 client -> must use[/URL]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95538742/Paradoxeco.rar"]Paradox ECO[/URL]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95538742/ParadoxPK.rar"]Paradox PK[/URL]
NOTE- THESE WILL NOT WORK UNTIL I AM FINISHED UPLOADING ONLY THE CLIENT WILL WORK AT THE MOMENT (PLEASE WAIT)
EDIT- sorry i forgot i was working on custom items with the new cache so i have a cache backup in the cache folder in data-> thats why it's 800+ MB my bad
I'M 90 tank dds on R-S
- Jon

item.title: Eldrazi/Paradox 728 ECO & PK releases
item.dc:creator: @jewystrength jewystrength
item.description:
@jewystrength wrote:

Okay, well i know a lot of you won’t know about this project because when i started it Matrix sources weren’t aloud of r-s.

the story: I started a 604 a couple years ago called Eldrazi, i worked on it for about 3 weeks straight with 4 other people. Turned out there where way to many bugs to be fixed by myself alone. So i released it on Mopar, about 3 months ago i started Eldrazi 718, i updated the cache to work w/out op codes to 728. i worked on the project on my own time for about a month than i got an offer from tyluur’s old head admin ‘tillian’ or ‘ryan’ and he had a VB forum and a 317 called lethium ‘yeah i know its the same as tyluurs old server’ but anyways he wanted a 718+ so we changed the project name to Paradox 728, i than updated to 736 cache and put it back down to 728 because we needed to release it in a week or two after i updated and i didn’t have the time to fix all of the object/npc path walking bugs. ANyways so i worked my ass off on the ECO server was almost ready for release but there where still a shit tone of bugs to fix so me and ryan came up with a new project [paradoxPK] now the concept of this was to have a pk server but not like all of the other pk servers out there. It was going to be based on PKing alone with rewards such as money & PK points based on if you where in multi or single and how much you where risking when u killed a player also with killstreak support. Now i almost finished it i just had to finish the shop system to work with PKP ‘pk points’ which i never finished because i resigned from the project because i need to move on with my life. So i gave ryan the sources + client, but i will not let my work go down that easy. I am releasing it to the public on both r-s and mopar if you would like to know more look below.

Features:

[ul][]All matrix features
[]fixed shop system
[]NPCdrop packing
[]drop editor fixed for 718+
[]custom home tele
[]new tutorial custom made for ease
[]worldmessage send after getting a rare drop
[]worldmessage sent after a 99 or 120 is achieved
[]ring o’ wealth
[]started slayer base
[]started shop editor
[]bones on altar
[]money pouch
[]max cash fixes for money pouch
[]and more i can’t remember[/ul]

what needs fixing:

[ul][]tutorial seems to not save at the end
[]portal teleing fixed ‘cbf to finish a simple dialogue’
[]finish the halloween event
[]items from other players not showing in general store
[*]all 13 trillion NPC spawns deleted ‘you have to add the ones that matter back’[/ul]

features and required fixes for PK SOURCE:

[ul][]killstreak w/highest killstreak support
[]custom quest interface for info tab
[]Pk point support
[]you need to finish my shop system for the pkp’s
[]tweak with the method for PKP rewarding
[]add money to the kills
[*]deleted everything in the PK source that is unneeded reducing lag by 40-50%[/ul]

Media: [NOTE- this is just media from eldrazi everything else was deleted on our website since i resigned ‘sorry’]

YOUTUBE -> tele system
YOUTUBE -> start tutorial





Sorry for no other media they where all deleted.

Credits
Matrix team -> 60%
me -> 35%
jagex -> 5% for cache

Sorry to everyone who hates me im done with RSPS peace guys

LINKS -

728 client -> must use

Paradox ECO

Paradox PK

NOTE- THESE WILL NOT WORK UNTIL I AM FINISHED UPLOADING ONLY THE CLIENT WILL WORK AT THE MOMENT (PLEASE WAIT)

EDIT- sorry i forgot i was working on custom items with the new cache so i have a cache backup in the cache folder in data-> thats why it’s 800+ MB my bad

I’M 90 tank dds on R-S

  • Jon
